meanings.definition: To counsel jointly or in conjunction with another person.
meanings.sent1: The two friends cocounseled the student on his career choices.
meanings.sent2: The lawyers cocounseled the client on the best legal strategy to take.
meanings.sent3: The siblings cocounseled their pet cat on the importance of grooming.
meanings.sent4: The teachers cocounseled the students like a team of wise owls.
meanings.sent5: The doctors cocounseled the patient with care and expertise.

meanings.sent1: She found a document that mentioned her cocounseled case.
meanings.sent2: The cocounseled meeting was crucial for the outcome of the trial.
meanings.sent3: The cocounseled folder contained all the necessary legal papers.
meanings.sent4: The cocounseled decision was made after careful consideration.
meanings.sent5: The cocounseled agreement was signed by both parties.
